metatab-latest: An extract of a subset of columns from the FFIEC Census Flat File, including
flags that indicate a tract is distressed.

column5: Url
http://civicknowledge.com

column4: Description of the 2022 census file, including all columns. Other years are similar
An Excel file with column positions and descriptions
An extract of the ffiec_distressed with fewer columns

column5: Description
ACS Geoid for tract
Key field.  HMDA/CRA collection year
Key field.  MSA/MD Code
Key field.  FIPS state code
Key field.  FIPS county code
Key field.  Census tract. Implied decimal point.
Principal city flag. 0=not principal city  1=principal city
Small county flag. T=tract record  S=small county  I=Island Area
Split tract flag. N=tract number occurs w/in one MA  S=split between MAs
Demographic data flag. X=Tot persons/population or median family income is 0  D=tot persons/population and median family income are not 0   I=Island Area
Urban/rural flag. U=urban R=rural  M=mixed  I=Island Area
Median Family Income of MSA in which tract resides
Median Household Income of MSA in which tract resides
Median household income for tract.
Tract median family income as a percentage of the MSA/MD median family income. Two decimal places, truncated.
FFIEC Estimated MSA/MD Median Family Income
Total persons
Total families
Total households
Total female population
Total male population
Total population minus white alone population
Minority population as percent of tract population rounded to two decimal places
Identifies Income Level Indicator (low, mod, mid, upper income areas)
Meets current year's poverty CRA distressed criterion?  'X' - Yes , ' ' (blank space) - No
Meets current year's unemployment CRA distressed criterion?  'X' - Yes , ' ' (blank space) - No
Meets current year's population CRA distressed criterion?  'X' - Yes , ' ' (blank space) - No
Meets current year's remote rural (low density) CRA underserved criterion?  'X' -Yes, ' ' (blank space) - No
Meets at least one of the previous year's CRA distressed criteria?  'X' - Yes , ' ' (blank space) - No
Meets previous year's CRA underserved criterion?  'X' - Yes , ' ' (blank space) - No
Meets at least one of current or previous year's CRA distressed/underserved tract criteria?  'X' - Yes, ' ' (blank space) - No
